thread.title: LISA KEOGH
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by LISA KEOGH

author: LISA KEOGH
title: LISA KEOGH
text: I just ordered an expensive tv, and applied for a credit card. Fairly quick and simple, I'm looking forward to a successful and easy delivery. The financing option was the reason I went with NFM. I hope I can continue to make purchases with financing options for my home in the future.
